column2: "<%me>! You are here at just the right time!"
"It's consultation time with Huey from the Council of Six!"
"I want to get rid of the awkward atmosphere between Claris Claes and Sara!"
"What relationship does the duo have? That I don't know! I don't want to know! And to be frank, I'm not interested!"
"However, we musn't leave the status quo as is! Nobody will move on in this stalemate!"
"1. What do you want me to do?"
"The worst that can happen is that they will start ignoring each other!"
"So, whilst they are still acknowledging one another, we will have to bring them together, even by force!"
"Worst case scenario, even if they hate each other, that's fine! That's better than ignoring each other, at least!"
"Both of them ignoring and not caring for each other, I will definitely not let that happen!"
"In the worst case, even that is fine. At least as they hate, they are acknowledging one another."
"However, they must not ignore each other! If they do that, even I will weep!"
"But, given Sara's personality, she will definitely say that Claris Claes has nothing to do with her."
"Even so, I want to do everything in my power to help them get along! You understand, don't you?"
"Well then, Operation Forced Conciliation is go!"
"I'll handle the preparations, you wait for me to get in touch! Fuhahaha!"
